New Records: USA secured their first-ever T20 World Cup super-over win against Pakistan
Uganda secured their first-ever victory at the T20 World Cup
Key Match Events: USA won the match in a super over after both teams scored 159 in their regulation innings
Iftikhar Ahmed was brilliantly caught by Nitish Kumar in the super over
Saurabh Netravalkar restricted Pakistan to 13 for one in the super over
Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan captain Babar Azam emphasized the importance of improving their powerplay performance
USA captain Monank Patel hoped the win would 'open many doors' for the game in the country
Post-Match Reflections: Monank Patel expressed his team's delight at securing a historic win
Uganda captain Brian Masaba described the win as 'huge' and'something totally different'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The USA will face India in their next match, while Pakistan will play India on Sunday
Scotland bolstered their hopes of progressing with a win against Namibia
Frank Nsubuga, the oldest player at the tournament, starred with the ball for Uganda
